modeValues.settingInterpretation: Direct display as a number. Values smaller than 1.000E-07 will be displayed as 0.
Input range of 0.0 to 1.0 is interpolated and displayed as the range 0% to 100%. Values outside this range scale more, e.g. 10 shows as 1000%
Adds a watt suffix (W) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. kW)
Adds a Kelvin suffix (K) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. kK)
Adds a degrees Celcius suffix (°C) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. k°C)
Adds a meters suffix (m) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. km)
Adds a Credits suffix (€) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. k€)
Adds a seconds suffix (sec) to the number. Does not divide and apply a metric prefix for Setting values >= 1000.
Adds a minutes suffix (min) to the number. Does not divide and apply a metric prefix for Setting values >= 1000.
Adds a days suffix (days) to the number. Does not divide and apply a metric prefix for Setting values >= 1000. Always indicates "days" even when Setting is 1.

Displays the Setting value as an octet-packed ASCII string of up to six characters. A Setting value of $414243444546 will display "ABCDEF" on the display. A Logic Memory Unit value of 71752852194630 will display "ABCDEF" on the display.
Adds a farenheit suffix (°F) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. k°F)
Adds a Litres suffix (L) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. kL)
Adds a Mols suffix (mol) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metric prefix to the suffix. (e.g. kmol)
Adds a Pascals suffix (Pa) to the number. Also divides the number as needed and adds a metricprefix to the suffix. (e.g. kPa)

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Sets the display mode of the LED Display to the passed value. (See Mode Values)

parameters.name: Setting
parameters.description: Sets the raw number to display on the LED Display.

parameters.name: On
parameters.description: Turns the LED Display on, when set to 1. Turns it off, when set to 0.

parameters.name: Color
parameters.description: Sets the color of the text on the LED Display. (See Data Network Colors)

outputs.name: Power
outputs.description: Returns whether the LED Display is turned on and receives power. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Mode
outputs.description: Returns the mode of the LED Display. (See Mode Values)

outputs.name: Error
outputs.description: Returns whether the LED Display is flashing an error. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: Setting
outputs.description: Returns the "Setting" value of the LED Display.

outputs.name: On
outputs.description: Returns whether the LED Display is turned on. (0 for no, 1 for yes)

outputs.name: RequiredPower
outputs.description: Returns the current amount of power, required by the LED Display, in watts.

outputs.name: Color
outputs.description: Returns the color setting of the LED Display. (See Data Network Colors)
